article_title: Is Kennedy Still the Swing Vote on the Supreme Court?
article_text:
Don’t have time to read the Washington Post or New York Times? Then get The Morning Bell, an early morning edition of the day’s most important political news, conservative commentary and original reporting from a team committed to following the truth no matter where it leads.

Email address

article_metadata.description: Conventional wisdom says Anthony Kennedy is the swing vote on close Supreme Court cases. But recent events suggest John Roberts may be vying for that role.
